meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by anaphylaxis.
meanings.sent1: The anaphylactic reaction caused her throat to swell up.
meanings.sent2: The doctor quickly recognized the anaphylactic symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The anaphylactic response to the bee sting was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of spiders was anaphylactic, making her scream at the sight of one.
meanings.sent5: The anaphylactic shock was so severe, she had to be rushed to the hospital.

meanings.definition: Having an allergic reaction to a substance.
meanings.sent1: He experienced an anaphylactic rash after eating peanuts.
meanings.sent2: The anaphylactic response to the medication was alarming.
meanings.sent3: The anaphylactic allergy to cats made her sneeze uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His anaphylactic sensitivity to pollen made spring a challenging season.
meanings.sent5: The anaphylactic reaction to seafood left him breathless and dizzy.
